title: End-of-Life Care Education Design Based on Integrated Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing theory, practical experience, and communication skills
context.additional_context: Language education integrated with cultural context considerations, emphasizing end-of-life care competencies for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can apply culturally sensitive communication strategies when interacting with patients and families in end-of-life care.
Learners can explain evidence-based nursing techniques for managing physical and mental symptoms of terminally ill patients.
Learners can analyze ethical dilemma cases in end-of-life care and make decisions grounded in professional standards (NMC).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
